message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to invest in this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. This is a fair price given the value I place on it. Let's try to work this out.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $11,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $11,000. This is as low as I'm willing to go.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  $11,000 is closer, but still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $9,500 for the product. Let's try to bridge the gap. I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $10,500. I'm willing to make another concession and offer you the product for $10,500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept.
